installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Install script for Call of Duty 1.1

# Install required packages
apt update -y
apt install -y lib32z1 libc6-i386 wget unzip bzip2

# Download and extract base files
if [ ! -d /home/container/main ]; then
    wget -O /home/container/basefiles.zip https://de.dvotx.org/dump/cod1/downloads.php?get=basefiles
    unzip -o /home/container/basefiles.zip -d /home/container/main
    rm /home/container/basefiles.zip
fi

# Download and extract language files
if [ ! -d /home/container/main ]; then
    wget -O /home/container/language_en.zip https://de.dvotx.org/dump/cod1/downloads.php?get=english
    unzip -o /home/container/language_en.zip -d /home/container/main
    rm /home/container/language_en.zip
fi
if [ ! -d /home/container/main ]; then
    wget -O /home/container/myserver.cfg https://de.dvotx.org/dump/cod1/myserver.cfg

fi

# Download and extract Call of Duty server files
if [ ! -d /home/container/cod_lnxded-1.1d ]; then
    wget -O /home/container/cod_lnxded-1.1d.tar.bz2 https://de.dvotx.org/dump/cod1/cod-lnxded-1.1d.tar.bz2
    tar -xjf /home/container/cod_lnxded-1.1d.tar.bz2 -C /home/container
    rm /home/container/cod_lnxded-1.1d.tar.bz2
fi

# Download codextended.so
if [ ! -f /home/container/codextended.so ]; then
    wget -O /home/container/codextended.so https://github.com/xtnded/codextended/releases/download/v20/codextended.so
fi

# Set execute permissions
chmod +x /home/container/cod_lnxded
